title: Omniscient

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player at night. This is an astral attack that ignores all protections. **1 use.**

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are permanently blackmailed, and cannot keep a last will.
- At the start of the game, you learn everyone's roles.

desc:
Post 5104
*My powers have a grand consequence.*
